Text.Page:
Arachne is the queen of the spiders. She lives in a system of caves north of Frontera called Arachnaea.

I want to know if the missing people and the contamination problems we've been facing around here have anything to do with her, or with that place.

Take these supplies to Tenush at the supply camp outside the lair, then nose around a bit and find out what you can.

Let me see those. That's it? This isn't enough for our forces out here. How can I support troops without supplies?

Command just doesn't get it, blast them!

Well, not your fault, I suppose. Here. Take these supplies to Gatsil at Wary Vigil. Tell him I'll send more when I can.

These aren't nearly enough. Wasn't Tenush clear about our needs?

Well, let's be grateful for what we have. There are other units in worse shape.
